name: Make-Over Salon
description:
Storm your way in to world of fashion and fashion designers! ‘Dress Up’ is a mix and match game for young fashion inclined girls developed by KLAP Edutainment (Bubble Princess).
For every aspiring fashionista out there this game gives you an opportunity to style and experiment with clothes, accessories, shoes etc on your avatar! Play and mix around colors in every aspect with different fashion trends in 2 scenes.
You can create and re-create trendy styles to your heart’s content.
Download the game now for some fun and creativity!

Features:
-Selection of makeup: Skin tone, blusher, lipstick, mascara, eye shadow, eye brow color, colored contact lenses, different hair styles, and a collection of eye lashes
-Selection of clothes: Top and bottom innerwear, pants, skirts, t-shirts, shorts & socks
-Selection of footwear: Flip flops, knee high boots, ankle boots and sandals
-Selection of accessories: Sunglasses, handbags, jewelry, fancy head gears like hats and hair bands
